subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jon Diebler scored 21 points Saturday as No. 15 Ohio State beat visiting Eastern Michigan, 111-60, after losing the star forward Evan Turner, who hurt his back in a fall.
snippet: Jon Diebler scored 21 points Saturday as No. 15 Ohio State beat visiting Eastern Michigan, 111-60, after losing the star forward Evan Turner, who hurt his back in a fall.
